data.actual_result: An invite gets sent to the person you tapped and search bar doesn’t defocus
data.short_description: Attempting to defocus the search bar by tapoing the screen when inviting members just sends an invite
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have invite perms - Select the invite members option - Focus the search bar - Try to defocus the search bar by tapping outside the keyboard - Observe the invite screen
